column4: If you want to install Skype, you'll have to add a repository.
Add this line at the end of your /etc/apt/sources.list: deb http://download.skype.com/linux/repos/debian/ stable non-free
Then do 'sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install skype'
You can open the file with superuser privileges by typing 'gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list'
